name: cifti-label-adjacency
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
MAKE ADJACENCY MATRIX OF A CIFTI LABEL FILE.

Find face-adjacent voxels and connected vertices that have different label values, and count them for each pair.  Put the resulting counts into a parcellated connectivity file, with the diagonal being zero.  This gives a rough estimate of how long or expansive the border between two labels is.

inputs.name: adjacency_out
inputs.description: the output cifti pconn adjacency matrix

inputs.name: opt_left_surface_surface
inputs.description: specify the left surface to use: the left surface file

inputs.name: opt_right_surface_surface
inputs.description: specify the right surface to use: the right surface file

inputs.name: opt_cerebellum_surface_surface
inputs.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use: the cerebellum surface file

output-files.name: adjacency_out
output-files.description: the output cifti pconn adjacency matrix
